name: Vagrant-opsworks
body: # Amazon OpsWorks Configuration Provider for Vagrant [![Gem Version](https://badge.fury.io/rb/vagrant-opsworks.svg)][gem] [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/fancyguy/vagrant-opsworks.png?branch=master)][travis] [gem]: https://rubygems.org/gems/vagrant-opsworks [travis]: https://travis-ci.org/fancyguy/vagrant-opsworks A [Vagrant](http://www.vagrantup.com/) plugin that configures a multi vm environment based on a defined stack in [AWS OpsWorks](http://aws.amazon.com/opsworks/). This is helpful in rapidly spinning up a copy of a production environment without needing to maintain the configuration in multiple locations.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
